Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Matt and Mandy
Reviews.Content: I have owned four HDTVs, and this is my 3rd brand.  I really love this TV.  It is the only one that I haven't had to calibrate the picture because it is beautiful with the factory settings.  The picture looks great for Blu-ray and PS3 gaming.  It also looks great for over-the-air television channels, so it handles the high quality HD and low quality HD equally well.I purchased this TV because it exceeds Energy Star 4.0 standards, and Vizio has a great reputation for making TVs that last (unlike Samsung, which is a brand that I replaced when BOTH of my Samsung TVs stopped working).  This is also the only American brand, which all things being equal (and actually, they aren't because this TV outperforms other brands in my humble opinion) is a nice bonus for this purchase.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO LCD/LED Lights up my HDTV experience
Reviews.Author: Jack d'Enfield
Reviews.Content: I just obtained this model VIZIO HDTV a week ago, and am thoroughly satisfied with its performance in several media. HDTV with stereo sound via Comcast is stunning; DVDs (I don't have blueray) very good, as are VHS played on an ancient (1980's) Sharp. Haven't tried showing photos via USB or running laptop media yet, but it's nice to have this capability. According to my pre-purchase research, the three best quality HDTV manufacturers in the US market at the moment are LG, Samsung and VIZIO. VIZIO provided the best LED value for my money.

Reviews.Title: Excellent American Product
Reviews.Author: C. G. Harman
Reviews.Content: The delivery was very fast and it was deliveered by two persons, not one, so I had help  to bring the package into the room in front of its final location. Believeme, at 74 years old this counts for a lot.The installation was much simpler than with the older sets I have purchased. It needed no adjustment, the picture came up sharp and clear.The Vizio uses less than 1/3 the amount of electricity as the older, smaller set did. The picture is very bright and very sharp. It is also clear from a very wide angle (which was a surprise as well). My last , older Vizio, had faded or messed up picture when viewd from too sharp an angle, not this one.It also delivers a good picture in a bright , sunlit room.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!!
Reviews.Author: DS4242
Reviews.Content: This TV exceeds all my expectations!! Beautiful picture. It is VERY user friendly and exceptionally easy to set up.  The operating manual actually makes sense! We were up and running in no time!  I did a lot of investigation before purchasing this TV. I narrowed it down to this brand and a Sony. This one happened to be on sale and the price was too good to be true for the quality and size of this TV.  I had never even heard of VIZIO before, now I'm recommending it to everyone!

Reviews.Title: Light, VG picture, easy install of base.  Good price
Reviews.Author: P. Stein "Bengals Fan"
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th HDTV, and my 3rd Vizio (one returned), so I think I can write a worthwhile review.This replaces my 4 year old 37 inch Magnavox HDTV.  Was very pleased with it.  No problems.  Still sharp picture.  However, the color was no longer vibrant.  Moved it to a spare room for Wii play.  I think LCD TVs are good for 4 years max - due to color fading.  To be clear, color fading is tolerable in the kitchen TV, and bedrooms, but not in my main TV.I am satisfied with my one year old 32 inch Vizio kitchen LCD HD, and went with Vizio again.Since I was going from 37 to 42 inches, and have a glass stand, I wanted a light TV.  This weighs under 40 pounds, with stand.Easy to handle.  The base had a single screw (directions said 4, not true), which you hand tighten.  Easy installation.  The Magnavox base was difficult to install.  Had to call their tech support for help.These come with a good instruction manual, and are very easy to setup.  Sound is good.  Picture, very good in HD,  good in standard.  Soon, all programs will be in HD.  Blu Ray discs look great, as do sports events and movies.Purchased at my local warehouse club, as their extended contract pricing is very low.  I have had surge damage, on several occasions, and buy these warranties to protect against that.  Great price for a TV less than 2 inches thin.

Reviews.Title: My First HDTV ROCKS!
Reviews.Author: Kim Cantrell "Soap Box Bandit"
Reviews.Content: I *finally* broke down and purchased an HDTV. Before making the decision on which tv to buy, I researched brands, viewed friends/family's tvs, sought out other reviews. And the Vizio Razor Edge LED LCD won out.And after a couple of weeks, I can honestly say that I could not be HAPPIER.Although it was a bit fuzzy at first (making me fear that I had made the wrong choice), after approximately 40 hours of run time, the tv callibrated itself into the clearest, sharpest screen I have ever viewed.Yet, I must say that my FAVORITE feature has to be the thickness (or lack thereof, I should say) of this television.  After living a lifetime with those outdated, "pregnant" back televisions, I love that, although larger screen size, it takes up less space - really opening up a room. (Which I'm sure will only improve much more when we finish remodeling and transfer to a wall mount.)Remote:  super easy to program for DVD players, Wii.  (Was already fully functional for a Charter digital cable box)Side USB ports are wonderfully convenient for hooking up computer, camera, or flash drive.  Just plug in and go.While it may seem a little pricier compared to other brands of the same size, it offers more features, has superb quality, and is recommend not only by me but by numerous other reviewers.

Reviews.Title: Some are good, some are poor
Reviews.Author: Kevin Wilcox
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these TVs and had a large clouding or "backlight bleeding" problem.  It made the blacks look very light, especially when viewing a dark scene on a movie or video game.  I knew that a slight amount was normal, but this was so much that it really hurt the picture quality on dark scenery. It was very annoying and was over 25% of the screen, so I returned it.  I bought an Vizio LCD TV instead and am very happy with it.I know someone else that has this model though and there are no problems at all.  The picture is great and the sound is not as bad as everyone makes it out to be.  I just think that edge lit LED TVs need to be researched a little more to reduce the clouding issues, because some of them are severe.  I think I happened to get one that was just worse than others, but there is a chance that this will happen.

Reviews.Title: Super HDTV
Reviews.Author: Cyn
Reviews.Content: My first large TV from the old big ones. This TV is excellent and I understand with the LED it is more energy efficient. The true LED is still very expensive and cost allot more. The picture quality is excellent.  I was able to get a very good price.  I considered many others and liked the way VIZIO stands behind their product, It is easy to hook up and the customer service is excellent.  I did the hook up  myself. I purchased it on a special at Dell and am very pleased with the quality at this price for under $700.00. I will get another one, when I see a special again.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding
Reviews.Author: dave stone
Reviews.Content: Love it to watch my Lions on NFL Ticket and Sesame Street on PBS for my son. Excellent tv in everyway and a size that seems best, too, I might add for those who don't want a television being the overbearing show-piece of the whole house.  IMHOUpdate March 2012:TV died.  That simple, it just stopped working.  Had to go through the Vizio "customer service" (ha!) and got no hint of care or concern just arrogance that a tv not even 2 years old died.  They crassly offered me a refurb for about the price of a new tv.  I'll never do business with Vizio, tell people far and wide the same, and realize that in the end you do get what you pay for.  BTW, it was going on the blink even before it died - I was just hoping it would last until Apple releases their NEW television projected to be around Christmas.  But, no such luck.  Buyer beware!

Reviews.Title: Vizio satisfaction
Reviews.Author: Richman
Reviews.Content: Having purchased a 42" Vizio LED,LCD TV from Amazon.com I was very pleased with the prompt shipment date and the product when it arrived at my residence. I have been very satisfied with the Vizio TV and would highly recommend it to anyone interested in purchasing a new set.

Reviews.Title: Slick display
Reviews.Author: Janey
Reviews.Content: Best $700 I have spent in years.THIN, easy to setup, light, beautiful picture. PS3 games and blurays look siiiick! Stock audio is meh, but once I get a decent receiver/surround connected, this thing will be Angelic. Got it; was unboxed and playing BDs off the PS3 in like 10 minutes.Would buy again in a heartbeat. <3 this display.

Reviews.Title: Extremely nice for the price!!
Reviews.Author: morgantron
Reviews.Content: I am always looking for a deal.  I rarely buy anything before researching it and tirelessly searching the internet for the best price.  I rarely write a review but in this case feel I need to.  So far this TV is outstanding. I learned that LED is a bit of a gimmick in some of the techno geeks opinions, unless you spend big bucks the the nicer models.  I have 3 other LCD tvs in my home all 1080 and 120hz.  This TV blows them all away.  It is just beautiful.  I did purchase a calibration disk as well.  It did help improve the picture considerably.  I hooked it up to my blueray that is internet ready.  Works awesome.  I found an HD site where they stream nature landscapes and sounds.  I thought it would be the true test of the TV's picture quality.  The jaw dropped.  I felt like I could walk into the picture.  I highly recommend this unit for the price.  Check pricing that TigerDirect also.

Reviews.Title: Great TV! Wish it had more features though
Reviews.Author: scorpio88
Reviews.Content: This is my first HDTV, although I spent a lot of time looking at many models and other people's tv's before I bought this one. I originally wanted one that hooked up to the internet, but I settled on this one. Still, I wish this TV had those capabilities.The TV itself was very easy to set up. It came with a pretty easy to read manual with nice pictures. The remote is pretty intuitive - doesn't have a billion buttons like many of them do, but it has all of the buttons you need.I don't have cable TV, so I hooked this up to my Wii to test it out. The Wii only has 480i, so it was no where near taking advantage of the full HD resolution of this TV, but the Wii looked great. I streamed some Netflix movies over the Wii, and they looked excellent. Same with Amazon's streaming service - the picture looked great via the VGA cable off my computer.I recently purchased an Over the Air antenna, which picked up about 17 local channels. A few of them are in HD, and when I saw this, I was simply stunned. This tv displays HD content just as good, if not better than some of the bigger name brand (ie Sony, Samsung, LG) panels out there. It looked simply stunning.Sound is pretty good - not as good as my surround sound, but good for built-in speakers. Certainly some of the better built-in speakers I've heard.One little thing that I like is the Visio logo on the front - it glows orange when the TV is off, and white when the TV is on and/or warming up. I've found this useful compared to other TV's, where you have to guess whether they're on or off.I haven't tired any HDMI devices yet, but that will be next - Blu Ray player is the next thing I'm going to purchase.So, overall, I'm very impressed with the TV. Given the chance to purchase this or another TV again, I would purchase this one. It does everything I need it to, has great quality, and was a very good price.

Reviews.Title: Superb TV!
Reviews.Author: G. Landry "author of The Bridge Tender"
Reviews.Content: This is a gorgeous HDTV with superb picture quality.  It's also fairly light weight and the base could not have been easier to assemble.  Altho the instructions say to insert multiple screws, only one is required and it has a clever little thumbscrew handle that allows you to tighten it by just using two fingers.  No tools required at all.  Assembly and set-up take no more than fifteen minutes, if that long.A week ago, I had originally bot the "E" series version of the 32 inch Vizio that has the internet apps and built in 802.11n wireless.  The model number was something like E320VL.  I liked the internet features a lot (Netflix, Facebook, etc.) but the picture quality was terrible.  The picture was dark and stayed dark no matter which settings I tried.  Thus, I was hesitant to try another Vizio.  But as soon I turned on this 42 inch model I could instantly see that the picture quality was vastly superior. I am so very glad now that I took the chance and returned the E320VL and got this model instead.  In addition to the far superior picture quality, the base for this model is also much more solid and there was a lot more protective wrapping on the unit.  Just a guess, but it appears that the E series must be Vizio's lowest quality model line.  This 42 inch model is part of the apparently higher quality M series. I do wish it would have the internet apps, tho.  Seems odd that a higher quality model line such as the M seies does not have such a feature while a lower quality model line such as the E series does.Have not noticed any problems with the sound so far, notwithstanding the complaints of some of the reviewers. Also, I was told by the salesman that this model is only a Razor "edge-lit" LED rather than a full blown LED (he claims that Sony uses the same method in its LED tvs, i.e., a mix of LCD bulbs and LED bulbs). However, the picture quality is just too beautiful thus far for that to be a factor to me, especially considering the much higher price of the HDTVs that are full blown LEDs.

Reviews.Title: Suberb Picture, Terrible Sound
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: When I bought this TV it was the cheapest LED screen available. I haven't been disappointed, the picture quality is amazing, its very light and low power.The worst thing is the sound, I think to fit in the thin case they only put in small speakers, it really shows. I'd suggest only buying if you want to use a surround system or sound bar.I have a few other points, 4:3 SD channels can be zoomed or stretched to fit the screen, but that setting also zooms or stretches when you go to an HD channel which is annoying. The Vizio logo lights up and cant be turned off either which isn't ideal.So amazing picture for the money but not perfect.

Reviews.Title: Hold on a sec, here.
Reviews.Author: YRMV
Reviews.Content: Things I like about this TV:1) The image quality is MOST excellent, even right out of the box! Knife-sharp edges, killer contrast, accurate colors, eye-popping detail that few LCD TVs can match. Modern broadcast programs look almost three dimensional (and disturbingly odd). On the other hand, hockey games are mesmerizing. Even golf is fun to watch if only to marvel at seeing leaves on trees, blades of grass, and sweat on upper lips. Definitely the best LCD image I have seen on a reasonable priced TV.2)Energy consumption for such an image is also excellent. The back of the set gets barely warm. This was the feature that kept us from even considering a plasma TV3) Unpacking the TV was a breeze! 4 clips loosened the box and it slipped off in seconds. The base screwed onto the TV without needing a screwdriver. It took 10 minutes to go from box to watching Nature in HD.4) The curved edges soften the lines of the "Forbidding Black Rectangle of Doom" prevalent in large-screen TVs one sees in todays living rooms. It's a nice touch.5) I hook the TV up to my laptop and use it as a monitor when we want to cruise YouTube or look at photos. Again, the image quality is unparalleled...Things I hate about this TV:1) Unfortunately, I get better sound quality from my neighbor's antique radio. They must have used telephone speakers for this TV because that's about what the sound coming out of it is like. There are very few adjustments to be made that can improve the sound. If you want sound that is remotely acceptable, you WILL need an external audio package (amplifier + speakers). I knew this prior to purchasing my TV, so it wasn't a surprise; don't let it surprise you!2) The remote looks and feels like a cheap 20 year old cordless phone. The glossy finish means the unit constantly slips out of ones hands, unless yours are clammy. The buttons are all black and none are illuminated. You'll need a $5 Radio Shack clip-on book light to use the remote in your sexy, dimly lit media room. Either that, or keep the remote in your brightly lit kitchen when you want to use it.3) The Picture in Picture feature only works when viewing separate formats ie: TV and DVD. It will not work if trying to view two separate broadcast channels. Go figure.Overall:Every cent of your purchase goes into the image, with this TV. You definitely want separate speakers and maybe a usable universal remote. YRMV.

Reviews.Title: Vizio is bringing incredible equipment to the table!
Reviews.Author: Longfellow Deeds
Reviews.Content: If you are looking to upgrade from your current tv or make your first hdtv purchase, then I would highly recommend this unit.  Each year that passes by Vizio keeps putting out better and better products.  Edge lit LED on this tv gives such an incredible clear and crisp picture. Watching HDTV channels with direct tv etc gives an amazing picture from watching sports, to news, or movies etc.  With the tv being LED it puts off way less heat compared to most tvs and consumes less energy. The stock sound on the tv is no more than what any should suspect seeing that the tv is only 2 inches or so thick! Which is awesome.  If sound is an issue to you I highly recommend buying the vizio sound bar from amazon it adds incredible sound and increases the experience.  The size, picture quality, and over all performance of this tv is great. I've used the tv with hdmi for my ps3, watching hd television, and blue ray movies all which have really impressed me.  I highly recommend this tv to anyone for a bedroom or as your main living room tv.  Make sure to pick up hdmi cables off amazon and the sound bar with an optical cable if your willing to spend a few extra $.  Don't be fooled by paying tons of extra cash to go for a Sony or Samsung when you can get the same or close to quality with paying half the price by going with vizio.  Hope this review is useful

Reviews.Title: M420NV 42 inch, My first flat screen TV
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Since this is my very first purchase of a non-CRT television, some people might not give my opinion very much consideration. I can understand that way of thinking. However, I decided to make a purchase at Christmas time. I actually purchased my TV on March 16,2011.All through Jan. and Feb. I spent hours online reviewing television adds and customer reviews. Additionally, I spent hours learning the meaning and definitions of the vocabulary of flat screen, digital televisions. After narrowing down my choices, I then went to local stores to visually compare pictures and to discuss prices and the different options available with sales people.In the end, plain and simply, I bought this TV because the picture compared equally or usually better than anything else I looked at. The different options met all my current needs while allowing for future expansion of my system. The Amazon.Com price, while slightly higher than my $500 - $600 original budget, was unbeatable and still is.That only leaves one thing worth worth mentioning, the sound quality. It is only a little better than average. The speaker openings are towards the back and bottom. However, I've never heard better quality from other display televisions without external speaker systems. Finally, I also wanted to support a competitive American made product. This TV is an excellent product.This television met my needs in every way possible. After 6 weeks I am still blown away by the picture, the price, and the overall experience. In fact, since then, two of my friends have asked for my recommendation on selecting a flat screen TV that would meet their specific needs and budget. They both purchaed the items I selected for them through Amazon.Com.

Reviews.Title: Short Note
Reviews.Author: J. Bourne "wish i was in boston"
Reviews.Content: I am not a technical expert of HDTV so this review is short.  First the delivery was perfect!  The man who delivered the television even cut open the top of the box as he had noticed a slight dent on the corner and wanted to be sure it was not damaged.  That is what I call service.  After setting up the television, which was easy due to the quick instructions, I loved it!  The only thing I would recommend is to purchase a HDTV cable to hook up from cable box to unit before delivery.  There are multiple hook-ups on the back so you have a choice as to where to place cables according to where your box, DVD player and such are located. Amazon has proven you can get a good deal and receive an item such as this all intact and ready to go!  I couldn't be happier with Amazon and Vizio!  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Super TV!
Reviews.Author: Margie Glass Sula "Barigainista"
Reviews.Content: Great set for the price, hand delivered right to your living room with no hassle or annoying sales pitch about a warranty, ect.Slim, lightweight, easy to use, and doesn't use all the electricity like other sets.Affordable for this type of set, (and I do believe Vizio is an american based company)?Super picture, this is our first wider screen set so that takes some getting used to.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tv - led is the way to go
Reviews.Author: Lake Almanor resident
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for our A-frame cabin that has an entire wall of windows so glare has been a real problem. Not so with this 42" VIZIO led lcd TV. You can see the tv without having to close the blinds (and lose my view of the lake). The sound is really good for tv speakers. There is an adjustable equalizer and many preprogrammed sound options.  Another feature that I really appreciate is the tv automatically controls the volume of commercials. The high def picture is really amazing. The 42" screen is large enough to see from the far side of the large room but doesn't dominate the room. I purchased it thru Amazon and with the free shipping (it took about 7-9 days. I also own 2-50" plasmas and this led tv is far better. I highly recommend this tv.

Reviews.Title: Great features and picture for reasonable price!
Reviews.Author: Richard H. Tadlock
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this TV! I had a 22" Vizio TV which I was very satisfied with and thought I would give the big screen a go. The M420NV did not disappoint! The picture is very crisp with vivid color and the motion control makes every baseball game and movie a whole new experience. There are a lot of picture adjustments available through the GUI menu too. I like that Vizio has decided to use side-mounted speakers on their TV's now instead of mounting them in the bottom-rear of the TV case. The sound has improved a lot as a result. Of course, if you want better sound you should connect a receiver. The sound quality is perfect for TV and just fine for movies though. We stream Netflix from our Xbox 360 onto this screen using HDMI with a 15 Mb DL speed and the picture is very near HD. Overall, my wife and I are very glad we went with this make and model!

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV! Very pleased with this purchase
Reviews.Author: Mr. Biz
Reviews.Content: This TV is absolutely awesome!  I'm so happy I decided to go with this particular set.  I wasnt originally planning on buying an LED tv but now I'm super happy I did.  The Picture quality is just amazing! My friend who helped me install the mount and Tv actually said he believed that it has a better picture than his $1000+ Samsung he purchased just a few months ago. I couldnt be happier with the price tag of $650 for such a great TV.The speakers arent all that bad as people were saying.  You have to realize that they cant fit all that great of speakers in such a small Tv.  It only lacks Bass as the treble seems just fine to me.  I ended up just getting a nice set of 2.1 computer speakers and using them for surroud sound.  It consistis of 2 good speakers and 1 subwoofer.  Just get a RCA to 3.5 adapter and plug them into the speaker set. It sounds wonderful and I only spend $70 on a good set.The best part of this TV for me is the fact it will play regular TV at full screen if you adjust the settings in the menu.  This TV show less pixelation than most Tv's I've ever seen.  If you stand about 5 feet back standard Television channels have no pixelation at all and looks great.Buy this TV and you wont regret it!

Reviews.Title: Best in the market
Reviews.Author: True-user "Oh-well"
Reviews.Content: I really feel like hitting a jackpot.  As I paid much less money and got this much more superb HD TV.  It is my best X'mas gift ever.  The TV picture is so sharp and the sound quality is very good (I don't need a concert hall quality, but it is beyond a sound system level).  It easily beats out my other Samsung TV which is a piece of junk.But I would recommend Amazon to make payment plan easier for the customers who have Amazon credit card, not Amazon Store Card.  So more people can take advantage of Amazon's 6 month no-interest payment plan.

Reviews.Title: Vizio M420NV
Reviews.Author: Brian Beason
Reviews.Content: Hooked this up about 3 weeks ago and so far, so good. Love the picture on this TV. I am still playing with the picture setup options, but this TV has a lot of custom settings so it is just a matter of playing around until I settle on the look I want. My daughters like the Game setup for playing XBox. (If they would just remember to change it back when they are done.)Setup was very easy. Love the HDMI cables as I eliminated 3 different sets of cables from my old setup.Paired it up with a Samsung Blu-Ray player and the two work very well together. Sound from the speakers is only okay. But, no big problem as I have the sound run through a nice stereo system. Just starting to rent/buy Blu-Ray discs. They look fantastic!Not much of a techie, but I know a good picture when I see one. Very happy with this TV for the short time we have had it. Time will tell if we have any durability problems like the ones mentioned in some of the reviews. Our smaller Vizio is about a year old and we have not had any problems with it.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded my expectations
Reviews.Author: Stafford McKay Jr.
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research before finally buying this TV refurbished. I have had it for month now and am thrilled with the picture quality. The sound is not bad for a flat screen TV, but true audiophiles will want to hook it up to an external system. This is a solid product with a great quality to price ratio.

Reviews.Title: My son was right
Reviews.Author: LeeAnn
Reviews.Content: I had made up my mind to buy a similar but much more expensive 40 to 42 inch LED LCD TV, a Toshiba or a Sony.  But my son convinced me to buy the Vizio M420NV instead, thus saving me several hundred dollars  He had done a great deal of research on refresh rates and HZ rates and features I did not care to investigate and had determined that Vizio was as good or better than the more expensive brands.I am very happy I listened to him because this TV is just perfect for me.  The picture has perfect clarity and it was easy to set up and connect to cable and other peripherals.  The sound quality left a little to be desired but then so did the sound quality on many of the other brands.  It was easy to connect to my sound system and now the sound is also superior.What really sold me in the end is that Vizio is an American company and not many of them are left. Design, engineering are done in the USA. Although the TVs are manufactured in other countries, the profits stay in the USA.The benefits of buying from Amazon are self explanatory

Reviews.Title: If at First..........
Reviews.Author: ftmorganfoleys
Reviews.Content: This is actually the second Vizio 42 led tv we received last week.  The first one arrived doa Wednesday p.m.  We didn't know there was a problem until disconnecting and replacing our 32" Sanyo/Walmart dungheap, wall mount and all...... Powering up we discovered the display was toast - it looked like an LSD inspired broken window...... My husband was not happy.  We hoisted the dungheap back up on the wall and he began the Amazon return procedure. And to make what could have been a very long story, short, we received our new tv Saturday...... In our humble opinions it is a very good television, and the best 42" led/lcd tv value you can find.  Despite reservations about working with a non-bricks and mortar store, the entire process was great (except for the 1st tv being broken), and until they prove otherwise, we will buy almost anything we can from Amazon.  My husband does his homework.... And he is happy......

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: amazon95258
Reviews.Content: The built in speakers have a "tin can" sound quality to them.  Invest in the Vizio Sound bar...much better!

Reviews.Title: Great TV, great value!
Reviews.Author: S. Livingston "scottliving"
Reviews.Content: This set is a secondary TV in my house (I have a 55in Samsung LCD in the basement).  The 42in size was perfect to wall mount on an articulating mount.  The set is very thin and very light which made me comfortable wall mounting the unit my self.  The picture is great!  The sound isn't great, but I planned on using a sound bar anyway.  I highly recommend this set!This worked great with the cheetah articulating wall mount, sound bar brackets, and VIZIO VSB210WS sound bar and wireless sub.

Reviews.Title: Great Investment!
Reviews.Author: Marcel "The Urban Oracle"
Reviews.Content: The TV I had prior to this one was a 27 inch RCA ProScan and it was 17 years olds.  The picture was still great, but I felt it was time upgrade to a flat screen.  I wasn't sure as to what to look for so I did my research and came across this one and what stood out to me most is that there was hardly any bad reviews. Everyone loved this TV and raved about the picture quality and after receiving my TV less than 24 hours ago I understand why. The signal to my TV is just as crystal clear, bright beautiful as the one I saw on display at Wal-Mart.  This TV is a great investment especially for the money - VIZIO really did it with this one!  Also I didn't waist a lot of money on an expensive HDMI cord.  I bought the Amazon brand for less than $10 and the signal I receive is AMAZING. I ended up buying two of them because I needed one for my new LG Blu-ray player.  I am truly happy with my purchases.  Thanks, Amazon and Vizio!

Reviews.Title: VIZIO M420NV
Reviews.Author: RTG
Reviews.Content: The picture is incredible! My wife & I can't imagine how another set could look better..We have a Sony 32" Bravia. Still wonderful, but was too small for our family room~also was only 720p.And we don't understand the complaints about the sound..we usually have to lower the volume.

Reviews.Title: Upgraded from an old clunker- and I couldn't be happier!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth A Blyth
Reviews.Content: I'll admit I was nervous about trading in my old "big-butt" TV for a new model...but OMG! what a difference!! The picture is crisp, clear & beautiful, & the sound quality is great- though eventutally I will probably add some kind of surround-sound speakers to do movies justice.I hooked it up myself (and I am NOT a techy person, at all) to my DVR/Cable box and my PS2... took about 10 mins. I've had it for about a month and am extremely pleased- I recently upgraded my cable to HD and was surprised that the picture is even better! Also, I had read reviews here that others enjoyed the two-tone Vizio logo that is orange when the TV is off, and white when it's on- must say, VERY HANDY!! Would highly recommend this :)

Reviews.Title: Happy Choice
Reviews.Author: HG
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a TV which combined a faster refresh rate than 60hz was backlit by LED rather than fluorescent bulbs and consequently was thinner than previously available models.  Also, since the newer internet ready models are limited in terms of the applications that they can run, I was not interested in that capability, rather obtaining it from such small devices as the Apple-TV Apple TV MC572LL/A (2010)for around $100 which has greater flexibility, is relatively inexpensive and can be plugged in to the TV.  Even that has limitations, so it will be easy to replace it as newer models with more applications become available.  Although I have owned it for less than a month it seems to fit the bill very well.

Reviews.Title: Awesome 42" LED/LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: James C. McPeak "BIGMAC"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV about a month ago. It has amazing clarity. The sound could be a little better but it is OK. I would recommend this TV to anyone..I bought mine online thru WalMart and it cost me about $250.00 less than amazon.com.  Normally I buy my electronics from Amazon but not this time...I just happened to check this TV today on Amazon and dang they now have marked it down to what Wal-Mart is selling it for.. I wish Amazon had this price when I bought mine, I would of bought it from them. Instead as I mentioned in my review it was $250.00 higher at the time I bought mine from Wal-Mart..at least I could of saved the dang taxes...Oh well. Its worth what I paid for it for sure....buy it and enjoy the picture its really amazing...

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: James Roth
Reviews.Content: This TV is great, I have owned it for 4 months now and haven't had a problem with it at all.  It has an excellent picture that is comparable to Samsung and Sony.  And for half the price!! how can you complain about this TV!

Reviews.Title: You dont own one yet????
Reviews.Author: Eazy56
Reviews.Content: Im going to make this short.. Get one, this tv is great. After I added my surround sound to it, I think I watched this tv 48 hrs straight...Great for my Comcast HD Box and my PS3... The price was great, I ordered this TV a week before Black Friday. Now it looks like the price is $300 more now than when I purchased it......

Reviews.Title: Amazing tv
Reviews.Author: Jacob G Smith
Reviews.Content: I just got this tv a day ago and I love it!! The speakers sound amazing!! The picture is also amazing. It has great contrast and deep colors. The first movie i watched on it was avatar and it was stunning. I think the tv is very underpriced. I payed 513 for it and I thought I was pretty much stealing it. Vizio really outdid themselves with this TV. 5 stars for sure.

Reviews.Title: Awesome HDTV
Reviews.Author: DJ
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a reasonably priced HDTV and found this. I was unfamiliar with the Vizio brand and never owned a HDTV untill now. This TV is fantastic. The audio is clear and loud, picture quality is sharp, image is bright and Blu-ray movies are amazing on this HDTV.The HDTV does flex a little on the base when moving it to connect cables or to clean it. This is not a con. The majority of time the HDTV is untouched.The menu settings and audio options are abundant and far more than I need or use. The Vizio logo on front is neat. It is orange when off and white when on.The remote is simple and also works with Play Station 3.Great HDTV. Great Price.

Reviews.Title: Product quality is good
Reviews.Author: sokabaru
Reviews.Content: Product quality is good .. is according to the price paid .. recommend this product is just what I needed..all ok

Reviews.Title: This is simply amazing!
Reviews.Author: beatrice bolduc
Reviews.Content: Awesome clarity, super sharp picture. Rivals tv"s at a much higher price. Would definately recommend! Sound not so great, but since i have an audio system hooked up, i simply dont care,,,

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture when using HD
Reviews.Author: J. Weaver "Techie"
Reviews.Content: I brought this in Dec 2010 to add to my bedroom. The picture quality is great when using HD however low definition picture quality is poor. Guess this what's happens when you prefer HD instead.Pros:Picture qualityNumber of HDMI ports to add additional componentsNo noticeable shadowingDoes not run hot like some LCD tv'sPrice is less than a lot of popular name brand TV'sCons:Annoying illuminated "VIZIO" light in the front of the TV that remains on even when TVis offThe menu is cumbersome and not easy to follow.Overall I've come to like the VIZIO its a good buy and purchase decision that you want regret.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the money
Reviews.Author: J-Man
Reviews.Content: We have had this tv for about 6 months.....we don't watch tv very much so its great because it was cheap and has very good picture quality. BUT the sound is not very good at all.....but like i said since we don't watch tv very much its all right.PROS: Cheap, picture quality, easily viewable from most angles.CONS: Sound is very bad, "VIZIO" light stays on even when turned OFF, not a very compact design (the sides are rounded because of the speakers on the side.)

Reviews.Title: VIZIO TV
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: This is a value LED tv buy. I love this TV the picture is great as well as the sound. I had some trouble with the speakers about 5 months in but it was under warranty, VIZIO sent somebody out from Houston (I live 100 miles away) to come fix my tv, FOR FREE. He replaced all of the guts free of charge and now it works like a charm. Great for gaming!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Luke
Reviews.Content: Had it a couple years now without a problem. Can't imagine I'd shop anywhere else but Amazon for a new TV.

Reviews.Title: Best Deal In Flat Screen TVs
Reviews.Author: DaffyD "( : []="
Reviews.Content: I love the picture on this TV. I've never seen so many colors reproduced before. Yeah, it's only a 42" screen but for the price, I haven't seen another TV in its class with a brighter, sharper, more colorful picture. We don't have HDTV satellite service so we watch TV in standard def and the picture is so-so. But with high-def dvds this thing shines. I don't own a blue-ray player but I don't see how the picture could be any sharper. We can see the texture on castle walls and trees we never saw before. And the colors just pop out at you from the screen. A great test dvd is Finding Nemo. On this TV, we watch the film and gaze in awe at the colors and the sharpness of the picture.The picture and sound are totally customizable. You can choose from factory presets or make up your own settings. I created my own picture settings for watching movies since I wasn't totally happy with the movie preset.The weak part is the sound. SRS TruSurround HD audio? Not from these thin speakers. I bought a separate surround sound system and combined with this TV, it's like I'm in a movie theatre. There are times I wish I had a 50"-60" screen, but it wouldn't be worth it if the picture wasn't this good.What I also really like about this set is the oval "wings" on each side. The set isn't your plain rectangular design you see everywhere. The unique design of the TV frame sets it apart from the others.There are people who claim that Vizio uses remanufactured parts in their TVs and that's why the prices are so cheap. I don't know about that. What I know is that Vizio sells a lot of TVs because the quality matches the higher priced brands. OK, the black on this TV may not be as black as another brand, but I'll put its color palette up against any brand any day. Not sure how much longer Vizio will be selling this TV model so if you're looking for a bargain on a great-looking TV, buy this one.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Mark A. Dennis "Marq"
Reviews.Content: Thinest TV I've owned by far. Love the aesthetics, love the picture quality, love how MW3 looks on it, blacks looks truely black, colours are bright and vivid. Very happy with my purchase,....and I did looooaaads of LED tv reviews before settling on this one. I'm not one bit disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV, good quality, great price.
Reviews.Author: MDeezy
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV. Vizio has continued to make more and more great products. TV was as described and gives a quality and sharp image. I do not have cable I used my laptop which has an HDMI port on it. I can use the TV as a second monitor and picture quality is sharp. I put bluray movies on and it looks excellent. Watching "Cloudy with a chance of meatball" looked down right awesome on the TV. use high def devices on this tv because it can display it properly. I wish it had some netflix abilities but I still bought it knowing it doesn't have the feature built in, my Wii has it and I will soon get a pS3 so it's not a concern.Great tv for a good price.

Reviews.Title: Great find.
Reviews.Author: ras1979
Reviews.Content: After pricing out many other models, this one is the best value for the specs. Setup was simple and the previously used unit looks new. I recommend this to all of my friends and family when I can.

Reviews.Title: Clouds appeared on black screen!!!
Reviews.Author: Nikhil
Reviews.Content: Whenever the screen shows anything with black color, the clouds appear in some parts of the tv!! i called for replacement!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: treyvus "treyvus"
Reviews.Content: This TV has really impressed us. The price is very reasonable considering the quality and the features. This is our first VIZIO TV and won't be the last. So far we've had it for over a month and no problems. The picture quality is amazing.

Reviews.Title: Great picture and reasonable price.
Reviews.Author: Eddie
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV for about 3 weeks. I ordered Hi Def from my cable company and the picture quality is Great.I did have to turn off the tru-sound feature and the ambient light sensor as they do not work properly. The brightness and sound would fluctuate during the same scene and it was noticible and annoying.Once I disabled them, the picture was super.Also, I use my bose radio for the sound as the speakers in the TV are terrible.All in all, I would buy this tv again in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: Vizio LED TV
Reviews.Author: disold
Reviews.Content: Searched all the TVs for months and thought that this was the best value. As it turns out I was correct.  Good picture, sound quality and perfect for our family.  Of course, buying on Amamzon saved me taxes and the problem of lifting it, putting it in the car and carrying it into the house!

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: jameyl
Reviews.Content: with technology ever changing, a tv you might pay 3grand for today will only cost a thousand next year. so, i had a number in my head as to what i wanted to spend and set about to find the size and type i wanted. this one was a little above my price range but then again my expectations were out of step with price. none the less. i read the reviews and i made an informed decision.this is a great tv for the money. so far i have wrestled with picture quality. on dark scenes in movies it tends to have a "milky" or "hazey" look to it. when you try to adjust this out then it becomes too dark. so, you have to find the best balance for you and just leave it. when you are watching a movie with brighter scenes, like outside shots, then you wil be amazed at picture clarity and quality. the menu is easy to get to if you want to adjust anything but, its limited as to just how many different ways you can adjust it.overall i would definitely recommend it. i got mine for $669 with free two day shipping. and that's an excellent deal this year.

Reviews.Title: Good stuff, Gaming/audio problems were easily fixed
Reviews.Author: Brad
Reviews.Content: Great bang for the buck.Initially I was having gaming lag on my xbox due to the screen processing the picture, however this was fixed when I used an hdmi cable (instead of component...why I was using component makes no sense anyway), and also turning off the smoothing motion option (forgot what it was called, but it was the top option in the advanced picture section).If using the tv speakers as your primary sound...sometimes the levels aren't great...you can get more background noise and less voice during movies.  However changing the settings to "pop" will set the equalizer accordingly so you can hear the voices better.It runs very cool and has a great picture from wide angles.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't Be More Pleased
Reviews.Author: Stephanie A. Woodward
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV as a surprise anniversary gift for my husband. He was VERY surprised to receive it!Pros:* Ease of set up- It seriously took my husband 10 minutes to set up, and I'm convinced that 8 of those were pulling it out of the box.* Slim shape- This TV does not use a lot of useless plastic. It's thin, and most of the front is screen, rather than logo.* Picture quality- There are a few medical shows which have just become too real to watch!* Sound quality- We heard all about how flat panel TVs have sound issues from my brother in law, who insisted that we should also get a surround sound system. I'm glad we waited to see for ourselves. Sure, any action movie is made awesome with surround sound, but for everyday use, the sound quality is great.Cons:* The remote is just ok- It's slippery and difficult to hold on to, and it goes through batteries like I have never seen in my life. We've had the TV for about 6 weeks, and I just had to replace the batteries last night. Yes, that fast. Call me silly, though, but I just don't see a remote as a reason not to buy a TV... especially with all of the universal remote options out there today.

Reviews.Title: Awesome picture, but sound just OK
Reviews.Author: C. Miltenberger
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV after I couldn't get Walmart to price match. Walmart sells the TV online (same price as Amazon) and in-store (for $29 more than their online price) and would have one shipped to the store for the online price, in 5-10 working days. I told them to shove it sideways and ordered it from Amazon. Amazon offered free standard shipping. I chose 2nd day shipping (for less than what I would have paid in sales tax on the one from Walmart). Setup was painfully easy...the unit is surprisingly light and easy to move considering its width. The picture is just spectacular, even streaming Netflix movies over the composite input from a Wii. Unfortunately the sound leaves a bit to be desired. The bass is completely AWOL. For watching TV this isn't a big deal, but for watching movies we have to fire up the surround receiver. The remote is universal and worked great with my cable box. I could have used a few extra analog inputs (composite and component)...not everything comes with HDMI. Overall this has been a great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Kyle
Reviews.Author: kYLE
Reviews.Content: Great TV at a better price.  Get a sound system with it like a soundbar.  Good picture and easy to set-up.

Reviews.Title: Great television...
Reviews.Author: Sacredreichfan01
Reviews.Content: Have had this tv for almost five months now, was messing around with the remote the other day, and discovered that it works for the ps3. Awesome tv for the price, and I would say the picture quality is on par with the top brands in its league LG, Sony, Samsung, Etc..

Reviews.Title: Love this TV!
Reviews.Author: Daryll heysham
Reviews.Content: Never owned a Vizio set before, but if their quality is as excellent as this one, I'm a customer for life! Ordered from Amazon three weeks ago and it arrived within a week. Very easy to set up and I was watching it within 30 minutes of opening the box. The picture is awesome. Excellent colors and contrast. There is no bleedthrough of the backlighting or any similar problem. Very crisp images--HD movies and programs are so detailed and lifelike it's almost spooky! Tons of tweaks and adjustments are available on the menu. For example, the smooth motion can be turned from high to medium, low, even off, to omit the dreaded "soap opera effect." Really like the sleek black frame. (Incredibly thin at just over a inch deep!) With the lights down and sitting on the couch it's like watching a movie screen. Sound is very good--not amazing but better than many TVs that I've watched in this price range. Anyway, I will invest in home theater speakers down the road. A new (not refurbished) 42" LED/LCD TV that looks great for a bargain price of $669 plus tax (thanks free shipping!). Paid an extra hundred bucks for the extended warranty and I'm covered for the next four years. Very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money.
Reviews.Author: Bigdaddy Pill
Reviews.Content: I bought this television a few months ago. I had some really bad light bleeding to the point that the picture became almost overwhelmed by it. I took it back got another and there is no light bleed at all, and im very fussy about my t.v. The picture is amazing, friends have come over and been amazed by the picture, sometimes it still takes my breathe away. I feel its even better than whats considered higher end t.v.'s.Now the sound needs some help not great, but a sound bar or system will greatly improve that and make it a non issue. I have a sony sound bar and it's great. I highly recommend this product, one of the best pictures i have seen. I would buy this again in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: Price was great
Reviews.Author: W. Khan "HomerJ"
Reviews.Content: Picture is crisp, colors are vivid and sound is more then adequate for the size of my living room. Something that i've noticed recently is that sometimes i've seen the picture near the bottom flicker and appear a little blurry. So far, i haven't watched enough HD content on the TV to figure out if its a hardware issue or if its related to the Cable transmission itself. Thats the only reason i've taken a star off the review.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Andrew "Arsen23"
Reviews.Content: The picture on this TV is very good, I was shocked how clear and bright the picture was.  We have two LG's at home which are very good as well but this TV blows everything away in terms of picture quality!  I can't say anything about sound as I have the TV setup with Receiver.

Reviews.Title: So far so good.
Reviews.Author: Polaco
Reviews.Content: The TV looks brand spankin new! awsome picture and the price was great. I got the tv and the 4 year extended warranty for less than what Tiger Direct wanted for the TV alone.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I got this TV after my LG LCD TV picture went out and even though I was not to thrilled to have to buy a new TV, I found this one online and after bunch of research decided this was the one for me.  The picture on HD programs is SO amazing and such a difference from regular LCD TV pictures, the price is perfect and has all the input and extras that you would find on a more expensive TV.  I wouldn't know why one would spend so much more than what I got this TV for since this has all the hookups and features.  My mom actually was looking for a TV right after I got this and she ended up getting one of these and loved it just as much.  I would definitely recommend this TV to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great LED LCD picture for cheap price
Reviews.Author: LED RAZOR FAN
Reviews.Content: I was really impressed with picture quality and the sharp colors.  I also thought sound was decent. I have a 240hz LED LCD from LG that I love, and I thought this vizio was comparable for about $200 cheaper and maybe vizio better on sound because sound comes out toward you from the sides versus LG coming from bottom of TV.  Also very nice curb appeal, really about 1.15 inches thin, and fairly light for flat screen and looks very sharp in design.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money!
Reviews.Author: J. Fischer
Reviews.Content: I have a much more expensive Sony in the living room that is awesome but this Vizio for 1/4th the price is pretty darn great. Easy set-up, friendly remote, great picture (after some always required tinkering with the picture controls) and pretty decent sound from  these typically poor sounding flat screen tv's with tiny speakers.This is really a great looking tv and a great bargin so if its on your short list, just do it.Delivery from Amazon was perfect, on time, and much easier than lugging home a TV from the store yourself.

Reviews.Title: I'm in love with my Vizio!
Reviews.Author: grangie
Reviews.Content: Delivery was right on time as promised. They brought it into my living room and unpacked it for my inspection. After they left I attached the stand to the T.V. , plugged in the HDMI cable, turned on the T.V. , went through the set-up menu and have been in love ever since. The picture is awesome. The sound is great{ I hooked up a VIZIO sound bar.}I highly recommend this product!!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Paul J. Rollmann
Reviews.Content: I purchased the 47" with internet apps for my basement that I am remodeling.  But it wasn't done.  We put it up stairs.I fell in love with it... for kids, the Apps are great.. put shows on, on demand.. and kids can be demanding.So, I had to buy the another for the basement.  The viewing distance is shorter, so I went with the 42" this time.Love this TV too.  The Internet apps TV and NON apps TV are almost identical in there function.The remote is different, but still a very easy to use LEARNING remote.I literally have 0 complaints about either TV.  Picture is Awesome.. and it is very easy to set up and use.. which is important.I now have 2 of them... for the price it is a great quality product from an American Made Company..Let's not forget to support our fellow country employees especially in these times.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Duckcake
Reviews.Content: It's a nice TV, great for the price.  It's VERY big if you're use to an old 26" tube TV.  But it's very lightweight (45 pounds?).  Unless you have a huge room, this is a living room TV.  The picture quality is great no matter how far or close you sit to it.  The sound was ok, it didn't suck as some reviews make it out to be.  The only downside I felt on the sound was there was no difference between the volume being on 20 and it being on 100. The other big downfall I found on the TV was the USB ports.  When you plug in something it asks if you'd like to play the pictures, music, or video on the device.  It never recognized anything on an iphone (but it charges it, just like any other USB port).  So I tried a regular ipod, and it recognized it, but didn't find any of the music, videos, or pictures in any folders on it, even though I'm certain there is.  I don't know if someone knows something I don't about that but that's what I experienced.  In the end I would recommend it to anyone looking for a great, new, big, TV for a great price.  Not to  mention LED is always a plus!

Reviews.Title: Expectations exceeded ; Razor sharp image
Reviews.Author: James M. Olezene
Reviews.Content: This would have to be the best TV I have ever owned. Funny, but I was first told by a friend "You gotta get the VIZIO, they are brand to be reckoned with..." I knew the size I wanted to so off to Amazon.com to read the reviews I went. The reviews were all good and sounded very much like the advice my friend gave. Then came the purchase.....I could not be any happier. This TV really seems like it should have been MUCH more expensive. Razor sharp image ....120hz so virtually no blur....Vibrant colors..loaded with features ..VERY VERY HAPPY

Reviews.Title: Great picture and great value
Reviews.Author: Steven Spilmann
Reviews.Content: This TV does everything I need it to do.  The picture is great hooked up to my laptop thru HDMI and by way of Dish Satelite receiver.  I couldn't ask for a better value in an HDTV.  I don't use the speakers on the TV.  I have a Klipsch HD surround sound system that I use for sound.

Reviews.Title: Vizio TVs are awesome
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: The Vizio 42-inch Edge Lit Razor LED LCD HDTV is amazing, plus a great buy.  It has the back lighting which is great for watching television.  It looks great and very clear picture.  Perfect size for an apartment.  The ordering was easy with Amazon and delivery was as promised.  The delivery service was great that was used by Amazon.  Thank you, Amazon for providing these great buys for us.  Thank you Vizio for making such an affordable high-end product with many features others don't offer, and if they do, they are over priced.  We've had two Vizio TVs now...no issues with them.

Reviews.Title: Vizio M420NV
Reviews.Author: KM
Reviews.Content: This 42" TV is to update an early Sony Wega LCD of the same size, which still has a very good picture.  The Vizio had the features we wanted and is much smaller and lighter and at a good price. The picure quality is noticably better!!!!  So far we are extremely pleased with it.The only downside, as seems to be experienced by others, was Amazons carrier in our  case Home Direct/NE Home delivery. While Amazon were excellent their carrier was anything but customer friendly to the extent there was none.  In order to maintain Amazons good reputation they need to change/shake-up this carrier.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO 42 INCH LED LCD TV
Reviews.Author: sury seijas
Reviews.Content: this is my first vizio tv last led tv i had was a sony bravia i didn't  think this tv was going to have as good of picture as the sony but i was surprised at how good the picture look that i got one more  for my living room this great product for for the price

Reviews.Title: Vizio 42" LCD
Reviews.Author: M. Abate
Reviews.Content: Wow - what a fantastic find - 42" LED / LCD at a price that was irresistible and free shipping to boot.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Marilyn Ferris
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this purchase of the Vizio Razor 42" HDTV.It arrived in a few days, was well packed, and very easy to set up.I couldn't ask for more than what we got for the money we spent.

Reviews.Title: JFrank
Reviews.Author: John F Davenport
Reviews.Content: This is the second VIZIO tv I own and the picture quality and sound are great, have not had any problems with the set.

Reviews.Title: Received today, love it.
Reviews.Author: Brian Scheets
Reviews.Content: It looks as if amazon just increased the price of this tv by 30 dollars today-- but with good reason. This TV has great picture quality. I plugged it in, and the picture was fantastic. Really enjoying this set. I got a sound bar in addition for movies and I am sure that is going to give me all I need to make a complete set. If you are looking at a TV check this one out, it does a great job.

Reviews.Title: I love it !!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Diggler286
Reviews.Content: This tv was everything and more than what I thought. Delivery was fast and friendly, plus the Television is sleek and clear. It is also glare free unlike your Plasma and LCD models. LED is the new fad and I LOVE IT!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great TV. Awesome picture. The stand seems a little flimsy, but the TV will be mounted on the wall this weekend so that doesn't matter.I was watching Movie trailers in 1080P last night, and they look amazing. Blu-ray from the PS3 was amazing as well.The TV is also a nice looking TV set.

Reviews.Title: Great TV but sound could have been more
Reviews.Author: natraj
Reviews.Content: TV is really great in its looks and the picture quality. I really like the picture quality. BUt the only problem is the sound. It has big speakers on its sides but those aren't great.Other than the sound this TV is value for money.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Gmon
Reviews.Content: I checked this one out in a big store while taking a break from shopping online. It was sale priced and had the best picture on the wall, so I went home and bought it from Amazon.com. I love my new TV! Simple, easy connections and operations. At less than 40 pounds, it is well balanced on the stand, which can be quickly added with one bolt. The picture is spectacular and the high quality sound is perfect for my intended usage. I will now ALWAYS shop Vizio when I'm in the market for electronics.

Reviews.Title: Awsome HD TV best buy for the money
Reviews.Author: Mark O. Kelly "mokIrish"
Reviews.Content: One of the best pictures, best HD for the money arround in my opionion...Found this first at Wally Mart,  tried three different store, all out of stock.Found it here on amazon $20.00 cheaper and with free shipping, plus I got it in two days!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Buy from an American Company
Reviews.Author: Aaron Alexander "i like music"
Reviews.Content: I love my new tv! This tv has a superb picture, very bright and fast wit the 120hz refresh rate. Very clean with many different and custom adjustments for the picture. Sound is very good with occasional low moments but I have always attributed that to shoddy sound transfers to dvds and downloadable content. But it can get very loud if you need also with many different soundscapes and custom adjustments. I recommend this TV, especially if you can get it under $600

Reviews.Title: Great picture, easy set up
Reviews.Author: D. Dorsett
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this TV!  We did our research, and found great reviews for this TV.  Unwilling to spend a fortune, we opted for the 42 inch over bigger sizes.  The size is perfect.  Picture quality is crisp, color is true, and the sound is pretty good too.  We had some Bose speakers, which have made the sound perfect.  The controls are easy to use, even right out of the box.  Netflix and pandora online features were very easy to set up as well.  I highly recommend this quality TV, and you can't beat the price.

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV!!!
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Guys, this is a very good TV. I bought it back in Dec for $649 and the shipment was very fast, everything came in a perfect condition, setup is easy, and if you have a home theater this worth the money. LED tv for less than $700 , dont think twice!! Vizio is doing good! Hope the quality keep just getting better!!

Reviews.Title: WTF?
Reviews.Author: Jason O. Briley
Reviews.Content: Tv isn't even a week old after a couple days the screen went black. after a couple minutes it turned back on. Now it did it again and for good. called vizio and they said i need to get it repaired. i told them i didn't want to repair a week old tv and i would return it to the store. The picture was great and the sound was average. Not sure if i just got a bad tv or what. not sure yet if i'll just exchange it or get a different one.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Robert   Wilson
Reviews.Content: Went from 720 Westinghouse DirectTV to Vizio 1080LED and Dish HD,what a change!! Both changes outstanding!!

Reviews.Title: Works great until
Reviews.Author: Missaness
Reviews.Content: The tv itself worked really well. The PiP didn't work for us very well, but it wasn't something that took away our experience. I will say though, if you get this tv, get one heck of a surge protector. Ours died 6 months out of warranty, it was working fine yesterday, there were 2 lightning strikes today close by (comps, cable boxes, other tvs all work fine) but the tv is now displaying everything backwards and upside down. So either it was the lightning strike and the tv being less than durable, or it was the tv and it's manufacturers.

Reviews.Title: promising
Reviews.Author: Damien Barker "ACrimsonTear"
Reviews.Content: For those interested in this model,m420nv, you should know the newer model, m421nv, is available on amazon for an amazing 628. Having called vizio to understand what if any the differences were between the two, because the specs are identical, I was told that there weren't  any differences. Just that the m421nv was the newer 2011 model. I recently purchased this newer model, and it should arrive on my doorstep cum tomorrow . Will update accordingly628 is a steal though!

Reviews.Title: VIZIO M420NV 42-inch Class Edge Lit Razor LED LCD HDTV 120 Hz
Reviews.Author: Bobby Galloway
Reviews.Content: The TV I purchased at Amazon.com meets my expectations and more the price was remarkable and i would recommend buying this VIZIO M420NV 42-inch Class Edge Lit Razor LED LCD HDTV 120 Hz

Reviews.Title: Third time is a not a charm...this tv is "OK"
Reviews.Author: EJ
Reviews.Content: This is the third television I have purchased for my boyfriend here on Amazon.  Because I love him very much I have jumped through hoops to get him a great television at a great price.  The first television was great but had to be returned because it was always shutting off.  The second television ended up getting damaged (smashed screen) on accident by me.  The second television was also a Vizio but a different model, that televison was the best! This is the final attempt I made with this one....I feel that this televison does something strange, it makes the picture (movie/show/etc) look way too real meaning you can tell you are watching something where as the other two televisions were not as sharp and crisp and gave shows and movies that "hollywood gloss" on it to make it look more blended.  I do not know how to describe what happens with the is television but to say that it makes things look too crisp and sharp.  The upside to this television is that it does a great job with Blu-ray movies! The sound quality is okay and it has adequate hdmi ports.  My boyfriend thinks it is "ok" as well.  I hope to eventually buy him a 50" or 70" flat, thin, bevel edge 3D TV that I saw at BJ's! That will be next year after I get my tax return!

Reviews.Title: Worth the money for LED
Reviews.Author: RobynB
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with this TV. Not super expensive but I recommend spending the extra money for high end cords it makes a huge differance in the picture. The picture is much nicer on the LED compared to our other LCD TV's.

Reviews.Title: Great TV but...
Reviews.Author: DD
Reviews.Content: The tv is awesome the picture is very nice and the tv itself looks good I recommend this highly but the only problem was that the sound gets low at times even when the volume is very high and this happens every once in a while but it will be no problem if you get a surround sound system. Overall not bad for under 300 at the time i bought it.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV.. Sound alittle weak but who cares picure rocks!
Reviews.Author: TOM
Reviews.Content: I love my Vizio!!. Sorry Amazon but I didn't buy from you only because I found a referb. from Tiger direct for less then 530.00. Some people my be against buying a factory referb. whoever you save lots of money and any factory problems that came up are sent back and fixed. If anyone is seeing any negative reviews on this TV don't believe them. This tv is awesome. Colors, black, and sharpness are top notch. Now think about it not many people go online to post positve reviews about a tv that has fulfilled there needs, it usually people that get  a defective tv and bash it because they don't know what to do. Now Vizio is the number one selling tv manufacture in 2010 and built in CA.(USA) Consumer Reports also rated Vizio as a top rated in reliability. Just get tv you won't be sorry.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely GREAT LED/LCD!!!
Reviews.Author: Michael Gershon
Reviews.Content: This has the sharpest, clearest, most accurate color I've seen. The only thing lacking is the sound. Because of the very small area in which the speakers are located on either side of the unit, the sound quality leaves something to be desired. By hooking up my home theater to it, this pretty much solved the tinny sound. The picture is absolutely FABULOUS. Black is black! Everything is clear, crisp and just plain BEAUTIFUL! I would buy a similar LCD in a heartbeat!!!!!

Reviews.Title: My first big electronic purchase on Amazon
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: The price was very competetive.The product was delivered exactly when they said it would arrive.I am very happy with the quality of my purchase.

Reviews.Title: loved it until the hdmi ports went out after 2 months
Reviews.Author: c "c"
Reviews.Content: Almost didn't buy this TV because of Vizio being notorious for having a crappy product but the reviews were great.  So I took a chance that I now regret.  Everything about this TV was great until the HDMI ports went out.  First the DVD player wasn't recognized and then the signal for DirecTV wasn't recognized. Tried numerous things like resetting & rescanning for channels and nothing worked.  Know it's not my devices because I've got them plugged into my old Sharp Aquos and they're working fine.  Checked to see if I could return this to Amazon but it's been greater than 30 days so forget that (1 star for you Amazon for that type of return policy - this is why people shop at Costco).  Will try Vizio's tech support but I'm not optimistic.  I'll post the results of that as well.  My recommendation:  DO NOT BUY THIS TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV bad reception with an aerial antena
Reviews.Author: ironmanian
Reviews.Content: Bought the TV outside of Seattle to use an aerial antenna, but was told after not being able to get many of the channels my old Sony gets that Vizio tuners are weak.  Well they are, not impressed with the new TV since it does not get aerial reception and after trying every huge antenna ever made.  Otherwise if you are going cable great product...but I am stuck..

Reviews.Title: Broken
Reviews.Author: Jule Hayon
Reviews.Content: Bought this broken was a great product great sound quality, I just received this product broken and the seller wouldn't take it back!

Reviews.Title: I did good
Reviews.Author: country boy
Reviews.Content: This was my big envestment in many years for my first big screen TV. I did a lot of shoping and comepairing price and fetures for the right price. With 120 hz refresher, LED,and 42 In. screen this was by far the choice to try and hope for the best.The TV was easy to set up and get started. Some of the fetutes I like are great picture with any amunt of ambuent light,from light to dark in the room as TV ajust for it by it self,if turned on. This is also true for the sound control set for even sound during comursel breaks and regular tv shows. Remout control is layed out nice and list of code for remotes, for preaty much any unit you want to use with your TV's remote. The instruction book was easy to use and understand. Again very happy with TV's setup controls and easy use. I"m Happy with this viso TV.

Reviews.Title: ehh great tv if it wasnt defective like mine
Reviews.Author: Timt916
Reviews.Content: well i got this thing like 2 weeks ago and man it was tight as hell... i plugged in my ps3 and i was hella excited. i started playing modern warfare 2 and then it just starts twitching black. i was like??? then it goes completely black. so then i try switching hdmi ports. it works but the same problem occurs. i try plugging it into to the side hdmi, then it works 100%. it worked on the side hdmi port and the third one but it wouldnt work on the first 2. i got pissed off so i called vizio and tell me to bring it to a dealer place but i dont want to because its a huge tv and all i have is a camry. i called amazon to return it. it it wasn't for 2 hdmi ports not working i woulda kept it for sure. its a great looking t.v. and all but i wanted my money's worth. the tv quality was great but the design looked kinda funky... ohh and btw, it isnt an led tv... its actually an lcd led tv so it kinda tricks you.

Reviews.Title: This model does NOT have any internet connectivity
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Carol"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV based upon Amazon's statement that the TV had an ethernet port believing that it would have internet connectivity. It has no ethernet port & no internet connectivity. I'll be returning it and hope Amazon corrects its product listing.

Reviews.Title: 42" RazorLED TV
Reviews.Author: Sondra G Riggin
Reviews.Content: We have had this tv now nearly one month and so far everything is going well.  Very clear picture.  Have no complaints at this time. However I was a little disturbed when a few days after it shipped it dropped $11 in price but that is the way it goes.

Reviews.Title: Don't try to use this with your computer
Reviews.Author: Bruno
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV not too long ago, and was absolutely loving it, and I mean, loving it. Great pickup for the price I paid.I have a laptop with a bluray player, so obviously one of the things I do the most is play bluray videos from my laptop on my TV, have done that with my past 3 TVs, no problems. When I pick this particular model up, to my surprise, the manual says I require an audio cord aside from my regular HDMI cord. To say the least I was kinda intrigued. But ok, I purchased the cord.I hook them both up, mess around with the settings trying to get sound through the HDMI-HDMI cord, no luck. I then plug in the audio jack, nothing yet. I call Vizio customer support and they go through everything with me, nothing. No sound, no nothing coming from the computer. I unplug and plug in my old TV, everything works great. I plug in the SVideo and try that, great. No issues.If you want to use your laptop with your TV, do yourself a favor and buy a different one.
